channel.title: CVE Feed for Ladybirdweb -- Faveo Helpdesk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ladybirdweb -- Faveo Helpdesk

item.title: CVE-2023-1724|2024-08-02T05:57:25.241Z -- ladybirdweb -- faveo%20helpdesk
item.description: Faveo Helpdesk Enterprise version 6.0.1 allows an attacker with agent permissions to perform privilege escalation on the application. This occurs because the application is vulnerable to stored XSS.
